content.title: MobiPhleb (“we,” “our,” “us”) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application (“App”) and related services.
Personal Information
details: Name, phone number, email address, date of birth.
Address and location for phlebotomy visits.
Medical-related details (e.g., lab test requests, blood collection requirements).

content.title: Usage Information
details: Device information (model, operating system, unique device ID).
Log data about your interactions with the App (e.g., bookings, payments).

content.title: Payment Information
details: Transaction details when you make payments.
(Note: We do not store full credit/debit card information; payments are processed securely through third-party providers.)

content: Provide and manage bookings, phlebotomy services, and lab test requests.
Facilitate secure payments and transactions.
Send confirmations, updates, and notifications.
Improve our services, user experience, and security.
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations (especially regarding healthcare data).
Phlebotomists and healthcare professionals assigned to your service.
Laboratories and partner medical facilities to process your requests.
Payment processors to complete transactions securely.
Regulators or law enforcement where required by law.
We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.
We use secure servers and encryption to protect your data.
Access to personal and medical information is restricted to authorized staff and partners.
While we take reasonable steps to protect your data, no system is 100% secure.
Access and request a copy of your data.
Correct or update your information.
Request deletion of your account and personal data (subject to medical/legal retention requirements).
Withdraw consent for processing certain information.
Our services are not directed to individuals under 18 without parental/guardian consent.
If we discover data collected from a minor without proper consent, we will delete it.
Our App may contain links to third-party services (e.g., payment providers, labs).
We are not responsible for their privacy practices.
We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
Changes will be posted within the App with an updated “Effective Date.”
